import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CardThree(){const[taskInput,setTaskInput]=useState('');const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);// Add Task
const addTask=()=>{if(taskInput.trim()){setTasks([...tasks,{name:taskInput,percentage:0,id:Date.now(),completed:false}]);setTaskInput('');}};// Toggle Completion Status
const toggleTaskCompletion=id=>{setTasks(tasks.map(task=>task.id===id?{...task,completed:!task.completed}:task));};// Remove Task
